plot outline: Four men, all tired of their personal lives, plan an escapade to Uzbekistan to bring back the fun in their lives. They decide to not tell their wives about the plan, who then begin to speculate about it. What follows is a roller-coaster ride involving mistaken identity, international mafia and a plane.
title: Hoichoi Unlimited
plot: Four friends plan a "men only" trip to Uzbekistan. But can they ever flee from the close watch of their wives?

Four men, all tired of their personal lives, plan an escapade to Uzbekistan to bring back the fun in their lives. They decide to not tell their wives about the plan, who then begin to speculate about it. What follows is a roller-coaster ride involving mistaken identity, international mafia and a plane.
